itunes:title: JUN 17, 2022 - BIDEN ADMIN MAY DECLARE NATIONAL HEALTH EMERGENCY OVER ABORTION
title: JUN 17, 2022 - BIDEN ADMIN MAY DECLARE NATIONAL HEALTH EMERGENCY OVER ABORTION
description:
The Biden administration might declare a public health emergency through the Department of Health and Human services, which would allow them to invoke a law that would protect abortion access should Roe v. Wade be overturned. Virginia Governor Glenn Youngkin proposed a budget amendment to make it a felony to picket or demonstrate outside of a Justice’s home. Elon Musk is holding a ‘Twitter Townhall’ meeting with the employees to discuss his plans to turn Twitter into a global product that passes the law in every country and protects all lawful speech. Food shortage worries skyrocket as Pennsylvania farmers can’t afford to harvest crops due to record diesel prices.




Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


Go to www.goodranchers.com/poso to get $30 off your order and free express shipping with code POSO
